mapper.update:
update si_print_label
package_id = #{packageId,jdbcType=CHAR},
produce_date = #{produceDate,jdbcType=CHAR},
produce_batch = #{produceBatch,jdbcType=CHAR},
material_id = #{materialId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
num = #{num,jdbcType=INTEGER},
`type` = #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT},
origin = #{origin,jdbcType=TINYINT},
location_id = #{locationId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
relate_label_id = #{relateLabelId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
relate_package_id = #{relatePackageId,jdbcType=CHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
dr = #{dr,jdbcType=TINYINT},
where print_label_id = #{printLabelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update si_print_label set package_id = #{packageId,jdbcType=CHAR}, produce_date = #{produceDate,jdbcType=CHAR}, produce_batch = #{produceBatch,jdbcType=CHAR}, material_id = #{materialId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, num = #{num,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `type` = #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT}, origin = #{origin,jdbcType=TINYINT}, location_id = #{locationId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, relate_label_id = #{relateLabelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, relate_package_id = #{relatePackageId,jdbcType=CHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, dr = #{dr,jdbcType=TINYINT} where print_label_id = #{printLabelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.sql: pl.print_label_id, pl.package_id, pl.produce_date, pl.produce_batch, pl.material_id, pl.num, pl.`type`, pl.origin, pl.location_id, pl.relate_label_id, pl.relate_package_id, pl.create_time, pl.dr, m.material_no, m.material_desc, m.material_name

pl.print_label_id, pl.package_id, pl.produce_date, pl.produce_batch, pl.material_id, pl.num, pl.`type`, pl.origin, pl.location_id, pl.relate_label_id, pl.relate_package_id, pl.create_time, pl.dr, m.material_no, m.material_desc, m.material_name ,ma.warehouse_id, ma.location_id, w.warehouse_name, lo.location_no
mapper.select:
select pl.print_label_id, pl.package_id, pl.produce_date, pl.produce_batch, pl.num, pl.`type`, pl.origin, pl.material_id, pl.location_id, pl.relate_label_id, pl.relate_package_id, pl.create_time, pl.dr from si_print_label pl left join sm_receipt_label rl on pl.print_label_id = rl.print_label_id where rl.receipt_body_id = #{rbid,jdbcType=BIGINT} and pl.dr = 1
and pl.relate_label_id is not null
order by pl.create_time desc, pl.print_label_id desc

select
from si_print_label where package_id like #{no,jdbcType=CHAR} '%' order by print_label_id desc limit 1
mapper.insert:
insert into si_print_label (print_label_id, package_id, produce_date, produce_batch, material_id, num, `type`, origin, location_id, relate_label_id, relate_package_id, create_time, dr) values
(#{po.printLabelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{po.packageId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{po.produceDate,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{po.produceBatch,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{po.materialId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{po.num,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{po.type,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{po.origin,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{po.locationId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{po.relateLabelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{po.relatePackageId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{po.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{po.dr,jdbcType=TINYINT})
mapper.select:
select
from si_print_label pl left join sm_receipt_label rl on pl.print_label_id = rl.print_label_id left join si_material m on pl.material_id = m.material_id left join si_material_attribute ma on ma.material_attribute_id = m.material_attribute_id left join si_warehouse w on w.warehouse_id = ma.warehouse_id left join si_location lo on lo.location_id = ma.location_id where rl.receipt_body_id = #{rbid,jdbcType=BIGINT} and pl.package_id = #{pid,jdbcType=CHAR} and rl.storage_id is null

select
from si_print_label pl left join sm_receipt_label rl on pl.print_label_id = rl.print_label_id left join si_material m on pl.material_id = m.material_id left join sm_storage_detail sd on sd.print_label_id = pl.print_label_id where rl.receipt_body_id = #{rbid,jdbcType=BIGINT} and pl.location_id is null and sd.storage_detail_id is null
